sn52.9:1: On one occasion the Venerable Anuruddha and the Venerable Sāriputta were dwelling at Vesālī in Ambapali's Grove. Then, in the evening, the Venerable Sāriputta emerged from seclusion … . Sitting to one side, the Venerable Sāriputta said to the Venerable Anuruddha:
sn52.9:2: "Friend Anuruddha, your faculties are serene, your complexion is pure and bright. In what dwelling does the Venerable Anuruddha now usually dwell?"
sn52.9:3: "It is a gain for us, friend, it is well gained by us, friend, that we were in the very presence of the Venerable Anuruddha when he made such a bellowing utterance."
